control.name: icbNewItemRow
control.description: The NewItemRowPosition enumeration represents different locations to display a new item row. Values listed in this enumeration are used to set the GridOptionsView.NewItemRowPosition property.

control.name: sbStart
control.description: This button starts incremental search emulation, i.e. locating records by typing initial characters of the desired display value.

control.name: chEdit
control.description: Specifies whether end-users are allowed to invoke cell editors.

control.name: icbButtons
control.description: Specifies the editor button display mode.

control.name: ceMultiSelect
control.description: Specifies whether multiple rows (cells) can be selected simultaneously.

control.name: icbSelectMode
control.description: Specifies whether multiple individual cells or entire rows only can be selected.

control.name: sbRecords
control.description: Displays selected records in accordance to whether individual cells or entire rows are selected.
